response.original_title: Keeping Score: Charles Ives Holidays Symphony
response.overview: In this Keeping Score program, Michael Tilson Thomas and the San Francisco Symphony unravel the layers of Ives’s Holidays Symphony to reveal a surprising musical portrait of New England. The symphony’s four movements journey across the terrain of the seasons. From the intimacy of the winter hearth to the explosive concussion of the 4th of July, discover the insights Ives liberates in his music’s confrontational crunch.
response.title: Keeping Score: Charles Ives Holidays Symphony
